string-array.item: An English rock band that formed in Liverpool in 1960.
An American rock band that formed in Washington in 1987.
An Irish rock band from Dublin that formed in 1976.
Rap artist referred to as \'X\' who took influence from many artists outside of rap. Widely known for his public legal troubles
Swedish-American rapper, singer, and songwriter. He was a member of the emo rap collective GothBoiClique.
He was a leading figure in the emo rap and SoundCloud rap genres. Could still be alive
Christian rapper who discusses mental health problems
British rapper based in Atlanta, Georgia, United States
Canadian rapper and singer from Vancouver. He is best known for his 2019 single "Lalala" with producer Y2K
Anime themed rapper who gained a following on youtube
He is best known for his song "All Time Low," along with his writing and producing credits. Bellion has released four mixtapes and two studio albums.
Canadian-American actor and hip hop artist. Beginning his career as a child actor, he is best known for his roles in the films Cinderella Man and Good Luck Chuck.
Instrumental metal band that has blown up over the last couple years
American rapper. He rose to fame with the songs "GoodMorningTokyo!" and "Thot!", both going viral on TikTok and amassing millions of videos on the platform.
American rapper and singer. In 2019, he rose to fame with his single, "Valentino", peaking at number 92 on the US Billboard Hot 100.
